p: Synergy Interactive is partnering with a digital marketing agency to fill a Data Science & Analytics position. This contract position is remote based in NYC and will focus on CRM.
p.2: Candidates should be proficient in EComm/CRM KPI frameworks, reporting, insight, and analysis. Day-to-day instruments include SQL queries and Excel Pivot tables. Ability to prepare informative and actionable Powerpoint slides about findings and recommendations is required.

li: Create reporting requirements to drive data capture in the digital CRM experience.
li.1: Analyze CRM performance data (overall trends, open rates, clickstream, modular analysis, UX) to uncover meaningful insights and actionable recommendations
li.2: Create and maintain weekly, bi-weekly and monthly reporting.
li.3: Build ad-hoc analyses as needed to unearth CRM touches, phases or campaign-level learnings
li.4: Independently prioritize analytical needs of team and business, based on complexity, timing, and visibility
li.5: Perform basic statistical analysis, such as creating A/B test plans, calculating statistical significance, distributions, etc.
li.6: Effectively communicate complex ideas to primary client contacts, both verbally and in writing

li: At least 2-4 years of work experience in a business environment, with a minimum of 12 months successfully working with or adjacent to Email, SMS and Push Notification campaigns, such as in digital media or an intensively client-focused model such as an external consulting or marketing services firm
li.1: Bachelor=E2=80=99s Degree in Marketing, Statistics or equivalent experience
li.2: 1+ year experience with writing and updating SQL queries by hand and creating Excel pivot tables.
li.3: A storyteller, be able to make sense of data and extrapolate meaningful and actionable insights
li.4: Experience in creating and delivering presentations using PowerPoint
li.5: Experience in the multiple areas below is desired:
li.7: Basic knowledge of click stream tagging and reporting
li.8: Audience segmentation and communication (Cold, Warm and Hot audiences)
